name: Software Developer
description: Design, develop, and maintain software applications for various platforms.

name: Web Developer
description: Create and maintain websites and web applications.

name: Data Scientist
description: Analyze complex data to help organizations make better decisions.

name: Business Analyst
description: Bridge the gap between IT and business to improve processes.

name: Marketing Manager
description: Develop and implement marketing strategies to promote products.

name: Financial Analyst
description: Assess financial data and provide investment recommendations.

name: Accountant
description: Manage financial records, prepare reports, and ensure compliance.

name: Graphic Designer
description: Create visual content for print and digital media.

name: UI/UX Designer
description: Design user interfaces and enhance user experience for applications.

name: Architect
description: Design buildings and oversee construction projects.

name: Research Scientist
description: Conduct experiments and research in various scientific fields.

name: Civil Engineer
description: Design and supervise infrastructure projects like roads and bridges.

name: Doctor
description: Diagnose and treat medical conditions to improve patient health.

name: Nurse
description: Provide patient care and support in medical settings.

name: Pharmacist
description: Dispense medications and advise patients on proper usage.
